description:
Not quite floor pump fast, but a lot faster than most mini pumps. With a clever telescoping design this little high volume pump pushes more air with every stroke while still being small enough to toss in a hip pack.

  • CNC machined aluminum barrel
  • Telescoping design lets a small pump push more air
  • Reversible universal head fits Schrader and presta valves
  • Thumb-lock lever secures the head to the valve
name: MEC Telescopic Mountain Micro Pump
